lessons.japanese: 僕の郷里の町は海に接している。
lessons.english: My hometown is adjacent to the ocean.

lessons.japanese: 彼は郷里の両親によく電話しますか。
lessons.english: Does he often call his parents at home?

lessons.japanese: 彼は「飛び石」連休を利用して郷里を訪れた。
lessons.english: He availed himself of the 'off-and-on' holidays to visit his native country.

lessons.japanese: 私の郷里の町は海に接している。
lessons.english: My home town is adjacent to the ocean.
